body.description: Looking for an Aluminum-Free deodorant that's also kind on skin? Finding an effective deodorant for sensitive skin can be a challenge, but now there's a solution. Introducing Dove 0% aluminum sensitive deodorant for sensitive skin. It's an Aluminum-Free deodorant made especially for people with sensitive or easily irritated skin. Simply put, it's one of our most gentle deodorants for sensitive skin. With our unique 1/4 moisturizers, this skin-friendly Dove deodorant for sensitive skin cares for your underarms, helping to soothe them better than most deodorants for Women, and leaving them soft and smooth. Alcohol-free and Aluminum-Free, it's formulated with the care you'd expect from Dove - and 1/4 moisturizing cream. Gentle and soothing, it helps your skin feel beautifully soft and smooth. Because it keeps you feeling fresh for up to 24 hours, This is one Aluminum-Free deodorant Stick you can trust to keep odor at bay throughout the day. So for all-day freshness and smoother skin, Give your underarms the care They deserve with Dove 0% sensitive deodorant, a great alternative to natural deodorant. For the best results and a long-lasting freshness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dove 0% Aluminum Deodorant For Odor Protection Sensitive Deodorant Stick Provides 24-Hour Protection 2.6 oz 3 Count Looking for an aluminum-free deodorant that's also kind on skin? Finding the right deodorant for sensitive skin can be a real challenge but luckily, we have a solution. Meet Dove 0% Aluminum Sensitive Deodorant for sensitive skin. Like the name suggests, it’s an aluminum-free deodorant made especially for people with sensitive skin that can be easily irritated. Simply put, it’s one of our most gentle deodorants for sensitive skin. With our unique ¼ moisturizers, this skin-friendly Dove deodorant for sensitive skin cares for your underarms, leaving them beautifully soft and smooth. With 0% alcohol and 0% aluminum, it’s formulated with the care you'd expect from Dove - our ¼ moisturizers. Gentle and soothing, it helps your skin feel beautifully soft and smooth. Keeping you feeling fresh for up to 24 hours, this is one aluminum-free deodorant stick you can trust to keep odor at bay throughout the day. So for all-day freshness and smoother skin, give your underarms the care they deserve with Dove 0% Sensitive Deodorant. What is the difference between deodorant and antiperspirant? Both Dove antiperspirant and Dove deodorant keep you feeling fresh and protected from odor all day long. To stay dry all day, choose an antiperspirant to help control sweat. If all you need is something to keep you feeling fresh, choose an aluminum-free deodorant instead. Our Dove 0% Deodorant gives you up to 24 hours of odor protection. If all you're searching for is odor protection in a deodorant without aluminum, try Dove 0% Deodorant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unscented specials for me.
reviews.reviewText: This is deodorant, unscented perfect for me. I am allergic to scents and perfumes. This is for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant works really well and is healthy because it doesn’t have aluminum in it. Very pleasant to use every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Odd scent and a little sticky
reviews.reviewText: I've tried almost every "clean" deodorant under the sun. I've found a few that work, but one ingredient or another always ends up irritating me at some point. This seems to be a great alternative so far! My only complaint is that it dries sticky. So if you are looking for something smooth that doesn't grab a bit when your skin touches, I would try the 0% by Dove in the other scents that are not for sensitive skin. I'm preferring the pomegranate & Lemon better. Not as sticky and doesn't seem to irritate my skin in any way so far. This scent is also different. It's almost like a sport scent, but different in a way I can't put my finger on...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works, great product, fast delivery
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Would buy from this store again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: this product keeps me fresh all day and will definitely buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't last long
reviews.reviewText: My armpits have a mild BO smell after just a few hours of wear, even when just resting. When i use Degree Clinical, no smell for 2 days. I appreciate the lack of aluminum. But if I stink, I can't really use it when I will be socializing. Also, the edge of the package is sharp and feels scratchy when applying the deodorant. Nobody at Dove tested this on themselves apparently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars loser of things
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cause i can never remember where i put my deodorant. I love that it goes on clear and i have no smelled bad yet. i woke 12-16 hour days and it works just as it says. 24 hours no problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
